resources.string: Did you bring your own cup?
You need to pay for the paper cups we provide, at the rate of $2 each.
Order can not be processed\nQuantity must be at least ONE!
Order can not be processed until you select one of the above options!!
Value already ZERO, can not reset!
Value can not be less than ONE!

This application simulates a Coffee Shop. As easy as it looks like, it is pretty straight forward to implement. 

 So, when a new customer walks into a shop, the attendee asks for their initial credentials which when they visit again need not to be produced again-instead, they can only present limited resources to validate them within their database which the shop made on their first appearance. 

 I have tried my best on making this app easy to debug and extend, hence it's source code is available on GitHub. 

 If you find a bug somewhere, please create a PR so that I can approve and merge the changes you made. 


Thanks for stopping by!
Now, you can order your coffee within a blink of an eye.
Tap this banner to know more about your order.
